verses.plain: Whoso loveth instruction loveth knowledge: but he that hateth reproof is brutish.

tokens.t: Whoso loveth instruction loveth knowledge: but he that hateth reproof

verses.plain: A good man obtaineth favour of the LORD: but a man of wicked devices will he condemn.

tokens.t: : but a man of wicked devices will he condemn.

verses.plain: A man shall not be established by wickedness: but the root of the righteous shall not be moved.

tokens.t: A man shall not be established by wickedness: but the root of the righteous shall not be moved.

verses.plain: A virtuous woman is a crown to her husband: but she that maketh ashamed is as rottenness in his bones.

tokens.t: a crown to her husband: but she that maketh ashamed

verses.plain: The thoughts of the righteous are right: but the counsels of the wicked are deceit.
The words of the wicked are to lie in wait for blood: but the mouth of the upright shall deliver them.

tokens.t: to lie in wait for blood: but the mouth of the upright shall deliver them.

verses.plain: The wicked are overthrown, and are not: but the house of the righteous shall stand.

tokens.t: not: but the house of the righteous shall stand.

verses.plain: A man shall be commended according to his wisdom: but he that is of a perverse heart shall be despised.

tokens.t: A man shall be commended according to his wisdom: but he that is of a perverse heart shall be despised.

verses.plain: He that is despised, and hath a servant, is better than he that honoureth himself, and lacketh bread.

tokens.t: better than he that honoureth himself, and lacketh bread.

verses.plain: A righteous man regardeth the life of his beast: but the tender mercies of the wicked are cruel.

tokens.t: regardeth the life of his beast: but the tender mercies of the wicked

verses.plain: He that tilleth his land shall be satisfied with bread: but he that followeth vain persons is void of understanding.

tokens.t: He that tilleth his land shall be satisfied with bread: but he that followeth vain

verses.plain: The wicked desireth the net of evil men: but the root of the righteous yieldeth fruit.

tokens.t: The wicked desireth the net of evil
but the root of the righteous yieldeth

verses.plain: The wicked is snared by the transgression of his lips: but the just shall come out of trouble.

tokens.t: The wicked is snared by the transgression of
lips: but the just shall come out of trouble.

verses.plain: A man shall be satisfied with good by the fruit of his mouth: and the recompence of a man’s hands shall be rendered unto him.

tokens.t: A man shall be satisfied with good by the fruit of
mouth: and the recompence of a man’s hands shall be rendered unto him.

verses.plain: The way of a fool is right in his own eyes: but he that hearkeneth unto counsel is wise.

tokens.t: right in his own eyes: but he that hearkeneth unto counsel

verses.plain: A fool’s wrath is presently known: but a prudent man covereth shame.

tokens.t: A fool’s wrath is presently known: but a prudent

verses.plain: He that speaketh truth sheweth forth righteousness: but a false witness deceit.

tokens.t: speaketh truth sheweth forth righteousness: but a false witness deceit.

verses.plain: There is that speaketh like the piercings of a sword: but the tongue of the wise is health.

tokens.t: There is that speaketh like the piercings of a sword: but the tongue of the wise

verses.plain: The lip of truth shall be established for ever: but a lying tongue is but for a moment.

tokens.t: The lip of truth shall be established for ever: but a lying tongue

verses.plain: Deceit is in the heart of them that imagine evil: but to the counsellors of peace is joy.

tokens.t: in the heart of them that imagine evil: but to the counsellors of peace

verses.plain: There shall no evil happen to the just: but the wicked shall be filled with mischief.

tokens.t: There shall no evil happen to the just: but the wicked shall be filled with mischief.

verses.plain: Lying lips are abomination to the LORD: but they that deal truly are his delight.
A prudent man concealeth knowledge: but the heart of fools proclaimeth foolishness.

tokens.t: A prudent man concealeth knowledge: but the heart of fools proclaimeth foolishness.

verses.plain: The hand of the diligent shall bear rule: but the slothful shall be under tribute.

tokens.t: The hand of the diligent shall bear rule: but the slothful shall be under tribute.

verses.plain: Heaviness in the heart of man maketh it stoop: but a good word maketh it glad.

tokens.t: Heaviness in the heart of man maketh it stoop: but a good word maketh it glad.

verses.plain: The righteous is more excellent than his neighbour: but the way of the wicked seduceth them.

tokens.t: more excellent than his neighbour: but the way of the wicked seduceth them.

verses.plain: The slothful man roasteth not that which he took in hunting: but the substance of a diligent man is precious.

tokens.t: roasteth not that which he took in hunting: but the substance of a diligent man

verses.plain: In the way of righteousness is life; and in the pathway thereof there is no death.

footnotes.text: of a…: Heb. perverse of heart
The wicked…: Heb. The snare of the wicked is in the transgression of lips
